original_text: A man also or woman that hath a familiar spirit, or that is a wizard, shall surely be put to death: they shall stone them with stones: their blood shall be upon them.
korean_text: 남자나 여자가 접신하거나 박수무당이 되거든 반드시 죽일지니 곧 돌로 그를 치라 그들의 피가 자기들에게로 돌아가리라

sentences.original_text: A man also or woman that hath a familiar spirit
shall surely be put to death
they shall stone them with stones
their blood shall be upon them
